newsitem.title: USA: Class action suit filed against Comshare.
newsitem.headline: Class action suit filed against Comshare.

text.p: Comshare Inc was hit with a class action suit on August 21, filed by purchasers of the company's common stock between April 17 and August 6, a law firm representing the plaintiffs said Wednesday.

The complaint charges Comshare and certain of its officers with violations of federal securities laws by, among other things, misrepresenting or omitting material information about the company's financial results, a statement from the plaintiffs said.
"The damages have not been established yet, but we estimate we'll be asking for millions of dollars," said Marian Rosner of New York, lawyer for the plaintiffs, in a telephone interview.
Plaintiffs say Comshare reported revenue that it did not have a right to claim.
"We have not seen that suit," said Janet Neary, Comshare's outside attorney." It has not been served on us yet.
